title: Calories in a Cake Doughnut
meta_description: Discover calories in cake doughnut, including full nutrition breakdown per serving, macros, and variations for better dietary tracking.
assumptions: Plain cake doughnut, standard size (~60 g), fried in vegetable oil, no filling or heavy glaze.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, frying method, and toppings. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A standard cake doughnut contains about 226 calories with 13 g fat and 25 g carbs.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one cake doughnut?
faqs.a: Approximately 226 calories for a plain cake doughnut.

faqs.q: Are cake doughnuts high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 13 g total fat per doughnut, mostly from frying oil.

faqs.q: What's the carb count in a cake doughnut?
faqs.a: Around 25 g carbs, including 12 g sugars.

faqs.q: How does glazing affect calories in cake doughnut?
faqs.a: Adds 30-50 kcal depending on type; chocolate glaze increases it more.

faqs.q: Is there fiber in cake doughnuts?
faqs.a: Minimal, about 0.7 g per doughnut from flour.
